step_feedback.feedback: Good job closing your fingers into fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this step.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Ensure you're exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you do this.
Your arm movements are looking good. Keep focusing on the breath and muscle relaxation as you extend.
Great job extending your arms to shoulder height. Remember to exhale fully and relax your muscles.
Excellent work completing the repetitions. You're effectively opening your fingers and relaxing your muscles as you extend.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to fully close your fists and tighten muscles when bringing arms in, then open fingers and relax as you extend. Keep up the good work!
